Description.Text: Hotel Facilities: • Reception - Living • Breakfast • Cafeteria with modern fireplace • WC disabled • WiFi internet • parking • room service • satellite TV All rooms (junior suites) is an area of 32sqm to 42sqm and can accommodate from 2 to 5 people, equipped with all modern amenities and views of the mountain range of Pindos, the city of Kalambaka and unique Meteora. • Neoclassical bedroom • Sitting • Energy fireplace • Stereo • TV LCD 22 • Refrigerator • 2 private balconies • hairdryer • hydromassage • internet • air conditioner • heating • wooden floor • unique view • bathrobe • slippers • beauty kit • telephone
The hotel is situated in Koumaries area in Kalambaka in a hillside location at the foot of the Meteora rocks.
